entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
